_header: My Father above beholding thy meekness
Subjects: Christ, address to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, attributes of
_description: Jesus to the Virgin Mary, the Rose of Womanhood — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2251.First Lines:
My fader above beholdyng thy mekenesseAs dewe on Rosis doth his
                    bawme sprede…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Mankynde to save best Rosis of defenceWhan they me prey for
                    helpe in thy presence
BLHar2251.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
